name: playlist_extraction
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool miza.
Tool description: A multipurpose API that includes many image, video, and audio operations. Please see https://ko-fi.com/mizabot if you'd like premium features on the Discord bot itself!
API description: Produces information on all songs in a playlist (YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud, etc), with much faster response time than most other available tools. Currently O(1) for YouTube, O(log n) for Spotify, and O(log n) for SoundCloud. See [this article](http://i.mizabot.xyz/f/Bc9AUlCRkA) for the algorithm behind the YouTube playlists specifically.

search.description: The search query for the playlist.
